Language.Text:
Do you think the Proteans made a golden fish, which you come to and tell her your three wishes?
What would you wish for?
First, that stones do not fall on our heads.
Maybe there is a wish that could save the Proteans.
We just have to formulate it properly. Like in a fairytale ...
